description: Alone in the Dark is a survival horror video game series originally developed by Infogrames.
Assassin's Creed is an action-adventure game, set in an open-world environment.
Players fight in a modern battlefield, using modern weapon systems.
You play as an elite U.S. Marine Staff Sergeant, Henry Blackburn, and lead your squad alongside U.S.
A visually stunning 3rd person action game, rich in story, character and brutal combat.
An action-adventure game with hack and slash elements.
